attributes.action: introduce individual speed limits on motorways and duelled A Roads based upon the lane in which you're driving
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Individual speed limits including a MINIMUM speed limit in different lanes eg;

inside lane = 50-65 mph
2nd Lane = 65- 80 mph
3rd Lane (if applicable) = 80 - 100mph

Lorries etc - no overtaking during peak hours except on 3+ lane roads

an easy to understand idea which allows for both moderate and fast drivers to share the same road more safely and also does not require massive investment to implement.
